pr_title: Increase agent communication timeouts and add more logging

timeline.bodyText:
Instead of removing this, can I suggest the following API instead?
DaemonThreadFactory threadFactory = TRACE_WRITER.withInitializer(new Runnable()...)
timeline.author: tylerbenson
